name: Magic Squares (itch) (Pencil Game Studio)
description:
Mind challenging arcade puzzle game!

There are a lot of patterns of squares that you should remember and repeat them quickly.

Only one mistake can fail you

If you believe that you are very smart, then try this game to understand how smart you are!

Submit your highscore and challenge your friends

Can you earn all achievements?

Contact us: info[at]pencilgamestudio[dot]com
